name: R5-address-use-for-R2
title: Cross-version VS for R5.AddressUse for use in FHIR R2
description: This cross-version ValueSet represents concepts from http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/address-use|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R2. Concepts not present here have direct `equivalent` mappings crossing all versions from R5 to R2.
